keyMoments.title: Noro Noro Beam vs Gomu Gomu
keyMoments.description: Foxy uses the Noro Noro Beam to slow Luffy's stretched punch, demonstrating how the fruit's ability can counter even rubber-based attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the tactical effectiveness of the Slow-Slow Fruit against powerful opponents.

keyMoments.title: Kyubi Rush Technique
keyMoments.description: Foxy demonstrates the Kyubi Rush, a technique that combines the Noro Noro Beam with rapid punches to create accumulated damage.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals one of the most effective combat applications of the Noro Noro no Mi.

abilities.name: Noro Noro Beam
abilities.description: Emits purple beams of Noroma Photons that slow down anything they hit for 30 seconds. Slowed targets accumulate kinetic force that releases all at once when normal speed returns.

abilities.name: Kyubi Rush
abilities.description: A rapid barrage of punches delivered to a slowed opponent. The victim doesn't feel the impacts while slowed, but experiences all the accumulated damage simultaneously when the effect wears off.

weaknesses.weakness: Beams can be reflected using mirrors
weaknesses.description: The Noro Noro Beam photons can be reflected back at Foxy using reflective surfaces.

weaknesses.weakness: User is not immune to own photons
weaknesses.description: Foxy can be affected by his own Noro Noro Beams if they are reflected or redirected back at him.

weaknesses.weakness: Requires arm movements to generate beams
weaknesses.description: Disabling or restraining Foxy's arms prevents him from generating Noroma Photons.

reveals.information: The Kyubi Rush technique allows Foxy to deliver multiple punches that hit simultaneously after the slowdown ends

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu Countered by Noro Noro
keyMoments.description: Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Pistol is slowed by Foxy's Noro Noro Beam, showing a weakness when the rubber's speed is negated.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Luffy's rubber powers can be tactically countered by abilities that affect speed and timing.

weaknesses.description: When Luffy's attacks are slowed by the Noro Noro Beam, the rubber's stretching speed advantage is negated, making attacks easy to dodge.
